description: This file defines a Java interface 'BankAccountRepository' which extends JpaRepository, providing database access methods for 'BankAccountEntity', including a custom method 'findByNumber' to retrieve a bank account by account number.

classes.name: BankAccountRepository
classes.description: A repository interface for performing CRUD operations on BankAccountEntity objects, with a custom method for finding accounts by number.

methods.name: findByNumber
methods.description: Custom repository method to find a bank account entity by its account number, returning an Optional instance.
